name: Pazaak Cantina - The Card Game
description:
Master the iconic card game from the legendary game series as you play high wager credit matches and defeat endless challengers. Win Pazaak credits and create your dream card deck with 72 collectible Pazaak cards to unlock. Engage in turn-based game-play, defeat challengers, win credits, unlock special cards, level-up, and dominate the Pazaak Cantina!

CREATE THE ULTIMATE DECK
Blue cards? Red cards? Special cards? It's up to you to construct the ultimate side deck to gain the upper-hand in the high stakes matches. Make key strategic choices while building a deck containing complimentary cards to defeat anyone who dares challenge you!

BECOME MASTER OF THE CANTINA
Defeat opponents and Level Up as you dominate Pazaak in a far-off cantina. Visit the Statistics board to view your lifetime match statistics like Win/Loss ratio, credits won, and more.

NO PAID UNLOCKS
This game does not contain any items purchased with real money. All 72 cards are unlocked with Pazaak Credits that are won in matches.

ADVERTISEMENT FREE
Zero advertisements means you get to enjoy unlimited uninterrupted game-play forever.

PLAY ANYWHERE OFFLINE
This game does not require an Internet connection and is 100% playable offline. 

Read the history and rules of Pazaak here:
http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Pazaak/Legends

Pazaak Cantina follows rules that were used in both of the legendary original RPG games.


So what are you waiting for? Play Pazaak Cantina now!
